title: Auto-update Slack status with Last.fm
author: alexphillips
content: readme.md slack status updater (last.fm) app, while running, update slack user status what is currently playing the specified last.fm user. the app exists, status change 'no currently playing'.installgit clone https://github.com/alex-phillips/node-slack-fm-statuscd node-slack-fm-statusnpm installonce cloned, simply copy .env.example file fill the necessary credentials. just run run.js your last.fm username:node run.js lastfm_username
